definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
multifunction meter (e.g. for gas and electricity supply)

sentences.english: Shortcut menus are usually available by right-clicking the mouse.
sentences.chinese: 捷径功能表通常都可以按一下滑鼠右键取得。

sentences.english: The current implementation of this rule ignores menu items.
sentences.chinese: 此规则的目前实作会忽略功能表项目。

sentences.english: Other items on the menu include fried whale cutlet sandwiches and whale hot dogs.
sentences.chinese: 在功能表中还有烤鲸肉三明治和鲸肉热狗。

sentences.english: The following table lists the menu and toolbar items that are available.
sentences.chinese: 下表列出可用的功能表和工具列项目。

sentences.english: Added Location Check-in by Pop-up Menu of the Input View.
sentences.chinese: 输入法弹出式功能表新增位置签到功能。

sentences.english: Image that is displayed on the menu.
sentences.chinese: 取得或设定显示在功能表上的影像。

sentences.english: Supports directory browsing in the main menu.
sentences.chinese: 主功能表中支援目录流览。

pinyin: ping2 mu4 bao3 hu4 cheng2 xu4

definition: drive letter (letter assigned to a disk drive or partition) (computing)
